title: Ali Baba 2 Suoluomen Fengyin
synopsis: After leaving the treasure house world, Alibaba (voiced by Ding Yan), Margina (voiced by Ye Fang) and Xiaozhizhi (voiced by Sun Ke) once again joined hands on a new journey. This time, their goal was to find the long-lost treasure of Solomon, and Alibaba accidentally obtained an ancient book that recorded the hidden location of the treasure. However, in the process of searching for the treasure, Ali Baba accidentally broke the seal that restricted the devil, making the devil haunt the world again. The devil, who has been imprisoned for hundreds of years, is full of anger and desire for revenge. He wants to recover everything from humans. 　　 In order to make up for their mistakes, Alibaba and his team began to look for a sealed bottle that could re-seal the devil. What they didn't expect was that the sealed bottle fell into the hands of their old rival robber trio.(translated from douban)
